definition: very bad or serious; that you disapprove of
to a very bad or serious degree
(in ancient Greece and Rome) a boy kept by a man for him to have sex with
a tall tropical plant with thick stems from which sugar is made
the state of not feeling or showing that you are grateful for something
the oldest known bird, which existed about 150 million years ago
a woman who has the rank of a count or an earl
the wife of a count or an earl
to have an uncomfortable feeling on your skin that makes you want to scratch (= rub your skin with your nails); to make your skin feel like this
to want to do something very much
having or producing an itch on the skin
to want to travel or move to a different place; to want to do something different
